d:
"The Lunar Towers" is a Choose-your-own-adventure type miniseries originally started for the Lunar New Year and as content stand-in for the time off when I was moving from my old place... And has grown into its own little series! It features my mascot "Kitesona", a mascot I was memed into creating on Patreon and whom the dear patrons love to put into extremely lewd situation, at her own expense. :p

If you like this story and would like to participate in the voting, read it earlier at an higher resolution, access additional content (textless pages, etc), or just wants to support it, please consider supporting me on Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/thekite

Other links:
http://www.hentai-foundry.com/user/TheKite/profile
https://twitter.com/The__Kite

P30 and up: I've tried to experiment a more realistic videogame UI/UX feel for the second chapter, which was a rather interesting experience (I don't think I'm keeping the visual novel page style dialogues going forward, however...)
